name: Geraldo
description: '''Gerald Walcan Bright''' (10 August 1904 â€“ 4 May 1974), better known as '''Geraldo''', was an English [[bandleader]]. He adopted the name "Geraldo" in 1930, and became one of the most popular [[British dance band]] leaders of the 1930s with his "[[sweet jazz|sweet music]]" and his "Gaucho Tango Orchestra". During the 1940s, he modernised his style and continued to enjoy great success.
